availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Born in Echo Dell, Henry County, KY, son of Green Berry Tingle and Susan Coblin. Residence: Franklinton post office, Henry County, KY. Married Marticia Roberts in Henry County, KY, 8 Dec 1864.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, Franklinton post office, Subdivision 1, p. 40.

Find A Grave, Entry for Green Berry Tingle, Jr. (1843-1913), Find A Grave Memorial # 15299360, Port Royal Cemetery, Port Royal, Henry County, Kentucky, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=15299360&ref=acom (accessed 27 May 2017).
